page.title: 02A SACRISTON GIRL'S DAY
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7:45 and then about 8:00 I have breakfast of toast and coffee. I get ready for school and at 8:20 we walk up to school in the next village. The bell goes at 9:00 and we go to Family Group. This is where all the brothers and sisters go and talk about the things that happened last night. Lessons start at 9:20. At 10:30 the bell goes to tell you that it is breaktime. Then at 11:55 we go to dinner. At 12:35 I go to my next lesson. At 3:10 the bell goes and we go home. When I go home, I do my homework and have my tea and watch television for the rest of the evening.
